verbs.description: [ARG0: surgeons] [V: target] [ARG1: hidden cancer cells] [ARG2: with help from glowing dyes in experimental procedures dyes] are being tested to make cancer cells light up so doctors can cut them out and give patients a better shot at survival dr sunil singhal national cancer institute cancer lung cancer breast cancer american cancer society
